query.default: create table {0} ([ReportSessionId] [varchar](256) NULL, [JobTitle] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [Employee] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [Department] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [BusinessUnit] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [DocumentName] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [DocumentLink] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [SignedResult] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [DateSign] [datetime] NULL)

query.mssql: SELECT [EntityId] ,[SignatureType] ,[Signatory] ,[SigningDate] ,doc.Name FROM [RX48].[dbo].[Sungero_Core_Sign] LEFT JOIN [RX48].[dbo].[Sungero_Content_EDoc] doc ON Sungero_Core_Sign.EntityId = doc.Id
